text: This week’s Supreme Court hearings lacked legitimacy in the eyes of the American people. More than 23 million have already voted. Republicans are deliberately defying the will of a majority of Americans who want whomever wins this election to fill this seat.

RT @SenateDems “Allowing President Trump to determine who fills the seat of Ruth Bader Ginsburg, a champion for women's rights & a critical vote in so many decisions that sustained the right to choose, poses a threat to safe & legal abortion in our country.”

—@SenKamalaHarris on #WhatsAtStake http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EkP5VJzWsAIkz0t.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1316166419785056257/vid/320x320/kDdiOQEO180ncCGK.mp4?tag=13

Whether Republicans confirm this Trump nominee to the Supreme Court is a matter of life and death for Felicia, who relies on the Affordable Care Act for more than $160,000 worth of medical expenses each year to survive. #WhatsAtStake http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EkeUlByXEAAXA2_.jpg
The American people won’t forget that in the middle of a pandemic, Republicans chose to confirm a judge instead of passing legislation to bring relief to those who desperately need it.

For all the poison that this President, his henchmen, and Vladimir Putin are injecting into this election, the best antidote is a big #vote from the American people. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1317270141487415298/pu/img/fAmjrWdplHCcV7JP.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1317270141487415298/pu/vid/480x270/pdKgKjE71njP7Qw9.mp4?tag=10

Over 217,000 people in our country have died from the #coronavirus Trump deliberately hid. 

Our people are suffering. They need relief *now* — it is no laughing matter, Senator McConnell. -NP http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1317228422792347648/pu/img/EMngb7WKrjGn-aAV.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1317228422792347648/pu/vid/480x270/u7V3tr9t0e3nAZLu.mp4?tag=10

Americans need the bold, science-based COVID relief that House Democrats passed.

While Trump’s erratic behavior fails to crush the virus, Moscow Mitch laughs at those suffering the most.

This is what we are up against — and it’s beyond despicable. #Vote 📽 #FridayMotivation http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1317074471803641857/pu/img/dbkdKtP0BW2RRylH.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1317074471803641857/pu/vid/480x270/McAyp_qMkg62-2Ew.mp4?tag=10

Far too many Native communities lack reliable internet access. This crisis is even more urgent during the COVID-19 pandemic. @RepDebHaaland and I are leading this bill to give Tribal Nations and Native Hawaiian organizations a real chance at increasing their internet access. https://twitter.com/RepDebHaaland/status/1316521669532545026 QT @RepDebHaaland Our native communities deserve equal access to broadband services, especially during this pandemic.
That’s why @SenWarren & I have introduced a bill to allow Tribes & Native Hawaiian organizations time to deploy broadband internet.
 
https://haaland.house.gov/media/press-releases/haaland-warren-introduce-legislation-expand-tribal-broadband-application

The LORD foils the plan of nations,frustrates the designs of peoples. But the plan of the LORD stands forever, the designs of his heart through all generations. Blessed is the nation whose God is the LORD,  the people chosen as his inheritance.

Psalms 33:10-12
